confessions.content: Hey guys, your developer here. This is your space so go crazy so let it all out whether it's a rant, a message to all emenents, a message to me, feedback, advice, questions or even something to motivate all the other users. Let's connect a little more and build our very own little community. If your confession doesn't show up right away that's because it needs to pass a few tests before it can be posted simply to make this a safe community for everyone. If you want a response on your message then drop your email (everyone won't be able to see it)and I'll get back to you. xoxo gossip girl
Degree khatam hogayi hai meri par majaal hai ke degree aur transcript lene ka process samajh aaya ho,
Great work guys! This was much needed for the freshies. So Proud!
This is so cool and pretty
